Active Skill.Name: Golden Capital
Active Skill.Description: Purifies the field with Holy Fire, inflicting Physical Damage (Damage Rate 120%/160%/200%/240%/280%/320%/360%/400%) on all enemies and afflicting them with Judgment, which inflicts Physical Damage (Damage Rate 24%/32%/40%/48%/56%/64%/72%/80%) once every 3 seconds for 9 seconds.
